Python Module Index

a | b | c | d | h | o | p | q | s | t
 
a
amazonmechanicalturk (Unix, Mac) The Amazon Mechanical Turk crowd interface for opencrowd
assignment (Unix, Mac) When a HITs are answered, they'll be retrieved as an assignment
 
b
bounding_box (Unix, Mac) Have workers draw bounding boxes on an image
 
c
crowd (Unix, Mac) a virtual class for extending crowd sources
 
d
database (Unix, Mac) A virtualized class for storing opencrowd components
 
h
HIT (Unix, Mac) The HIT object comprised of a Tasks' questions
 
o
Opencrowd (Unix) Acts as the interface between opencrowd and the user.

p
project (Unix, Mac) the project focuses on specific types of tasks
 
q
question (Unix, Mac) the question, made of sections, is converted into an html template
 
s
section (Unix) Sections are the smallest building block in opencrowd.
 
t
task (Unix, Mac) A task compiles a list of questions into HITs.

opencrowd

easy, powerful, opensource crowdsourcing
